text: Max Weißkirchen (also spelled Weisskirchen, born 18 October 1996) is a German badminton player. He participated at the 2014 Summer Youth Olympics in Nanjing, China. Weißkirchen won gold and silver medals at the 2015 European Junior Championships in mixed doubles and boys' singles events respectively. == Achievements == === European Junior Championships === Boys' singles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !
